welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sassenheim, Netherlands! Get ready to experience the charming Dutch countryside and immerse yourself in the rich history and culture of our beautiful city. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Sassenheim has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The terminal for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, no password required.
